source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Beginning to Draw From the Mind with Zen Doodle
items.headline: Zen Doodle - create rich and colorful artwork
objectives_summary: Be able to create medium to large scale Zentangle, Zendala, and Surreal drawings

items.title: Easy Steps to Figure Drawing - Anatomy of Male & Female Body

visible_instructors.job_title: Your art Guru, Artists at Hobitute
visible_instructors.name: Hobitute
visible_instructors.title: Hobitute  Artists

items.headline: All the techniques you must know to draw the Anatomy of Human Body – a basis for Figure drawing and painting
objectives_summary: The course has several lectures that are being taught by experienced artists who have taken pains to explain even the minute techniques, thus making it very easy for the learner to follow the concepts and practice

The course provides the learners a good understanding of the structure of Human body and composition of both male and female body, which would help compose figure drawing and shading easily. Also this course act as fundamental to figure painting
By completing all the levels under this course, the learners would understand the complexity of the subject and would learn the techniques of bringing energy and life to their drawings

items.title: Bookbinding: Make a Coptic Stitch Book
items.headline: Learn how to make a one of a kind Coptic Stitch Notebook from scratch.
objectives_summary: Create a one of a kind Coptic Stitch Book
Learn quality craftsmanship and skill
Dive deeper into the world of bookbinding

items.title: How to Carve a Caricature out of basswood - wood carving

visible_instructors.job_title: Wood carver, wood-turner and freelance photographer
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Kuzel

items.headline: Step by step procedures, design, transfer design on wood, basic cuts, roughing cuts, carving process, finishing, sanding
objectives_summary: Learn how to Carve a "Little Head Caricature"

items.title: Bounce Calligraphy - Beyond Modern Calligraphy Basics
items.headline: Add energy and playfulness to your calligraphy writing!
objectives_summary: Bounce Calligraphy
Playful Modern Calligraphy
Composition for Quotes

items.title: Learn to Knit in 3 Easy Lessons By The Knitting Channel
items.headline: Three lessons take you from beginner to advanced knitter, hosted by Celebrity Knitting Coach, Jill Moray.
objectives_summary: Grow from total beginner to advanced knitter in three easy 30-minute lessons and learn a breakthrough method that is easier, faster and more enjoyable than traditional knitting.

items.title: Tattoo Machine Building / Pimp & REBUILD your gun

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Tattoo Legend, Grafic Designer, Filmmaker, Youtube
visible_instructors.name: Lily
visible_instructors.title: Lily Lu

items.headline: Understand your TOOLS and become a better Tattoo Artist / for maximum performance
objectives_summary: How to pimp a tattoo machine
Get the maximum performance out of your machine
Full depth explenation of the tattoo gun

items.title: Impressionism: Paint this Countryside Path in Oil or Acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this landscape painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Paint A Winter Scene In Watercolours
items.headline: How to paint a full watercolour of a real scene from a photograph.
objectives_summary: This course should give you the confidence to paint watercolours without over mixing the paints and ending up with mud.

items.title: Learn How to Draw Anything! In 3 Simple Steps
items.headline: Learn how to draw anything with 3 simple steps that demystify the drawing process for beginners & make it easy & fun! :)
objectives_summary: Draw ANYTHING you want from a reference! :)
Break down the drawing process into easy to follow steps.
Improve your observation skills.

items.title: Watercolor Loose Florals
items.headline: Learn to paint six different flowers in a loose style
objectives_summary: Be able to paint six different flowers in a loose style: lavender, lilac, hibiscus, cherry blossom, calla lily, magnolia

items.title: Basics of Acrylic Painting for Crafty People
items.headline: Easy, Awesome DIY Art Projects - Illustrations & Still Lifes & Portraits & Landscapes & Bonus Drawing Tips
objectives_summary: Paint with acrylic paints
To apply composition rules
Choose an appropriate color palette

items.title: Acrylic Painting Workshop: Art Projects for Beginners
items.headline: Students Will Learn to Paint with Acrylic or Tempera Paints. 7 Step-by-Step Art Lessons for Young Artists of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 7 amazing acrylic paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Expressive Flower Painting Techniques w/ Acrylics & Collage

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Learn An Approach That Gets Amazing Results
objectives_summary: Learn an approach to creative expressive acrylic artwork. The steps you take when preparing to paint a subject matters more than the finished painting. Discover a process that get's positive results every single time.

items.title: Quick & Easy Travel Sketching

visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart

items.headline: With Ink & Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to choose a simple subject for your first travel sketch
How to measure and draw a basic building or landscape scene
How to add details with ink

items.title: The Ultimate Knitting Course: Knit From Beginner To Expert
items.headline: From complete novice to expert knitter in two simple projects - A scarf and gloves
objectives_summary: Follow any pattern and correct their own mistakes
All the basic knitting techniques - Knit, Purl, Cast On, Cast Off, Increase, Decrease.
Create a scarf and gloves
